tool_description: Distributes job postings across multiple job boards and platforms simultaneously with platform-specific formatting and scheduling.

job_description_text.description: Finalized job description text ready for distribution

target_platforms.description: List of platforms to post to

employment_type.description: Employment type: full-time, part-time, contract, or internship

posting_duration.description: Number of days to keep posting active (7-90)

immediate_publish.description: Whether to publish immediately or save as draft

application_deadline.description: Application deadline date-time in ISO 8601 format

contact_email.description: Contact email for applications and inquiries

priority_platforms.description: Platforms to prioritize for posting order

budget_per_platform.description: Maximum budget per platform for promoted postings

error_messages: Platform authentication failed: Unable to authenticate with one or more target platforms
Content validation failed: Job description doesn't meet requirements for some platforms
Invalid posting duration: Duration must be between 7-90 days
Invalid employment type: Use one of [full-time, part-time, contract, internship]
Salary range error: salary_max must be greater than salary_min when both are provided
Platform limit exceeded: Cannot post to more than 15 platforms simultaneously
Invalid application deadline: Deadline must be in future and in valid ISO 8601 format
Missing platform credentials: Authentication credentials missing for one or more platforms
Budget insufficient: Budget per platform too low for promoted posting requirements
Platform unavailable: One or more target platforms are currently unavailable
usage: Provide job description, title, platforms list, location, employment type, department, and contact email. Optionally set salary range, posting duration, deadline, and other preferences. The tool will distribute the posting across all specified platforms with appropriate formatting.

distribution_summary.description: Overall summary of the distribution process

successful_postings.description: Platforms where posting was successfully published

failed_postings.description: Platforms where posting failed with error details

posting_urls.description: Direct URLs to the published job postings

total_reach.description: Estimated total potential candidate reach across all platforms

posting_ids.description: Unique posting IDs for each platform for tracking

estimated_applications.description: Predicted number of applications based on platform performance
